joelib2.molecule
Class IsomerismHelper

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.molecule.IsomerismHelper

public class IsomerismHelper
extends Object

Helper class to detect E/Z isomerism.

Method Detail

getCisTransFrom2D3D

public static int getCisTransFrom2D3D(Bond bond)
Checks bonds for cis/trans isomerism using 2D/3D informations. Single bond flags will be not set if a cis/trans double bond is detected.

Parameters:
bond -
setSingleBondFlags - set the single bond flags BondHelper.IS_TORUP/BondHelper.IS_TORDOWN, if true and a cis/trans bond is detected.
Returns:
int Z_ISOMERISM for cis, E_ISOMERISM for trans and EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED for undefined isomerism
See Also:
EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED, Z_ISOMERISM, E_ISOMERISM, isCisTransBond(Bond)

getCisTransFrom2D3D

public static int getCisTransFrom2D3D(Bond bond,
                                      boolean setSingleBondFlags)
Checks bonds for cis/trans isomerism using 2D/3D informations.

Parameters:
bond -
setSingleBondFlags - set the single bond flags BondHelper.IS_TORUP/BondHelper.IS_TORDOWN, if true and a cis/trans bond is detected.
Returns:
int Z_ISOMERISM for cis, E_ISOMERISM for trans and EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED for undefined isomerism
See Also:
EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED, Z_ISOMERISM, E_ISOMERISM, isCisTransBond(Bond)

isCisTransBond

public static int isCisTransBond(Bond bond)
Checks bonds for cis/trans isomerism using the SMILES flags up/down bond connected to a double bond.
Cases:
E/trans -- bondUP/doubleBond/bondUP
E/trans -- bondDOWN/doubleBond/bondDOWN
Z/cis -- bondUP/doubleBond/bondDOWN
Z/cis -- bondDOWN/doubleBond/bondUP

This method does not check multiple definitions. If no up/down informations are available, the getCisTransFrom2D3D(Bond) method is used also to get cis/trans informations. Single bond flags will be not set if a cis/trans double bond is detected.

Parameters:
bond -
Returns:
int Z_ISOMERISM for cis, E_ISOMERISM for trans and EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED for undefined isomerism
See Also:
EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED, Z_ISOMERISM, E_ISOMERISM, getCisTransFrom2D3D(Bond)

isCisTransBond

public static int isCisTransBond(Bond bond,
                                 boolean setSingleBondFlags)
Checks bonds for cis/trans isomerism using the SMILES flags up/down bond connected to a double bond.
Cases:
E/trans -- bondUP/doubleBond/bondUP
E/trans -- bondDOWN/doubleBond/bondDOWN
Z/cis -- bondUP/doubleBond/bondDOWN
Z/cis -- bondDOWN/doubleBond/bondUP

This method does not check multiple definitions. If no up/down informations are available, the getCisTransFrom2D3D(Bond) method is used also to get cis/trans informations.

Parameters:
bond -
setSingleBondFlags - set the single bond flags BondHelper.IS_TORUP/BondHelper.IS_TORDOWN, if true and a cis/trans bond is detected.
Returns:
int Z_ISOMERISM for cis, E_ISOMERISM for trans and EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED for undefined isomerism
See Also:
EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED, Z_ISOMERISM, E_ISOMERISM, getCisTransFrom2D3D(Bond)

setCisTransBond

public static void setCisTransBond(Bond bond,
                                   int ezType)
Sets up/down informations for cis/trans isomerism of a double bond.
Cases:
E/trans -- bondUP/doubleBond/bondUP
Z/cis -- bondDOWN/doubleBond/bondUP

The method gets two heavy atoms with the highest atomic number and sets the corresponding up/down bond flags for cis/trans isomeres.

Parameters:
bond - the double bond
See Also:
EZ_ISOMERISM_UNDEFINED, Z_ISOMERISM, E_ISOMERISM, isCisTransBond(Bond), getCisTransFrom2D3D(Bond)
